name: FATIMA SAFAR
motto: Admittedly, Old One names are easier to read than say.
story: While anyone with a working knowledge of the occult may read simple signs in the bones, stress, or Tarot, these are but childrens books for Fatima Safar. Her ability fo connect dozens of minor phenomena into accurate prophecy is unparalleled in modern times. The future is nof set until it becomes the past, and for an investigator of Fatimas skill, even a few minutes of warning can divert events away from potential catastrophe, whether that be through preparing a proper trap or simply running the.
